Notes

Limited edition of 50 w/ fur pouch and white shell. Magic Bullet Records released these cassettes to commemorate THIS WILL DESTROY YOU's maiden voyage across the nation's highways. This cassette is a very special limited edition tour cassette featuring Young Mountain in its entirety, special remix versions of selections from the album, and labor-intensive handmade packaging (bear fur and duct tape). Due to the hand-crafting, each cassette is unique.
